column2: Ancient Greek: Parthenikòn) is a town and comune in the Metropolitan City of Palermo
column4: southern Italy. It is 30 kilometres (19 mi) from Palermo and 71 kilometres (44 mi) from Trapani.

column1: The father of American musician Frank Zappa was born in Partinico. The street Via Zammatà where the Zappa family once lived
column2: was later renamed to Via Frank Zappa. In 2015 Zappa's son Dweezil released an album titled Via Zammata'.The Italian prime minister Vittorio Emanuele Orlando represented Partinico in the Italian Parliament from 1897 until 1925.

column1: Danilo Dolci was an Italian social activist
column4: and for some time resident at Partinico.

column3: anti-Mafia television station Telejato is based in the town.
